content: I have been a deliveroo plus customer until recently as I decided to cancel my membership. I was quite annoyed to find out that in some cases, deliveroo is charging a higher price on the dishes on top of the restaurant prices. This is despite being a plus member and paying an admin fee on every order. The actual straw that broke the camel’s back for me was a large order I made through them. I placed a large order for a group of friends for a special Friday occasion. It was placed well with plenty of time ahead of expected delivery. The order showed as processed, then out for delivery then as the driver was literally one minute away I got a notification saying the order was cancelled. The customer support told me they cancelled that large order because one side dish was not available.This is super problematic on many counts. - the fact that they cancel a large order just because a side dish is not available . They could have refunded the side dish and send the ones that are available - the fact that they can cancel an order made 1hour in advance literally last minute- the fact that the status update on the app is so unreliable. How can it show the order complete and almost arrived but cancelled when driver was 1 minute awayThis has ruined my Friday and I don’t forgive them. Only thing they offered was a ridiculous £5 credit which I refusedStay away from this overpriced joke that is deliveroo
title: Overpriced and poor customer service…

content: Only the 2nd time of using deliveroo and probably never again! Placed a basic order at KFC and it didn't get delivered until 2 hours later...except it wasn't even the correct order given to us! We had to eat someone else's order (which was less food) and stone cold anyway!
title: Just poor all round...

content: We ordered a takeaway in December only to see a £7.99 charge on our February bank statement.  Our bank told us that we had set up a regular payment for Deliveroo's plus service.  This must be one of those almost hidden click buttons, we had no need for this as we rarely have take out food.  We contacted Deliveroo who emailed us to say there was no account under our email address.  They have now taken a second £7.99 this month.  Our bank has put a stop on any further transactions but we consider that Deliveroo have acted in a very underhand manner as they claim we do not have an account with them but they are happy to deduct £7.99 from us each month!
title: An unresolved regular monthly payment we were not aware of
